remarks: The sum of a real number modulo a positive real number and another real number equals the sum of the two real numbers modulo the positive real number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2018.)
statement: addmodid $p |- ( ( A e. NN0 /\ M e. NN /\ A < M ) -> ( ( M + A ) mod M ) = A ) $.
